message: What are you working on this summer?  Any interesting projects?

Working on polishing up another paper.  If you have time, I'd like to send it your way in the next few weeks.  It's stuff you've seen before, but reworked.  And then I'm sort of casting about for other stuff.  A scary time.
@bmcd I'm happy to look at it. I've got a project I really want to start, but I'm bogged down in some old papers now.
I'm also nervous about the impending no-longer-working-on-dissertation-stuff phase, but excited, too.
I will note that I think I finally have an argument that masses exist, so I'm hoping to get that ready to submit to the APA Central.
